doc:
Gene Lockhart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gene_Lockhart 0 Edwin Eugene Lockhart (July 18, 1891 – March 31, 1957) was a Canadian-American character actor, singer, and playwright. He also wrote the lyrics to a number of popular songs. He became a United States citizen in 1939. Edwin_Eugene_Lockhart ( July_18_,_1891 – March_31_,_1957 ) was a_Canadian-American_character_actor , singer , and playwright . He also wrote the_lyrics to a_number of popular_songs . He became a_United_States_citizen in 1939 .
